title: Mirror of Germany. No. 292 = Deutschland Spiegel

description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". One of a series of magazine films depicting various aspects of life in West Germany. Includes a football match in North Germany, appeals to the public about smoking and drinking by the Federal Health Information Centre, the World Hairdressing Championships at Dusseldorf, testing at the Experimental Institute for Ship Building, Berlin Jazz Week, the historic spa town Wimpfen and ski jumping at the Oberstdorf jump at Bavarra.
